fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Dark Times: if you are lynched, the town gains another 24 hours in the day phase, and may lynch again.
- Lost Hope: If you are lynched as good traveler, every town member is roleblocked tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be aligned with the Town or the REF at random.
- This role cannot spawn naturally.
- Dead players may vote as well when this is in game, as well as speak, use their abilities, have all attributes they would have, and register as alive for investigative results.
- While this is in the game, dead players roles are not revealed.
- If a dead player ever votes, you learn their role.
- Majority is not affected by this.

fields.name: Special Mechanic - Travelling:
fields.value: - If a player is not a spectator and wishes to join the game before night 2, they may decide to join as the Outsider. Limit of 1 per game, and travelling may be denied at the hosts discretion.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Enter the town and assist in the elimination of your opposition.
